about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor.
The story continues with Nikki and her husband inviting the boss home for another live cuckolding experience.
Will Adam find pleasure in tainting their marital bed with another man?
Follow their Sex Story and find out!

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Nikki & Adam, and embark on their journey of spicing up their marital life in a brand new and wild cuckold Sex Story.

EPISODE 8
The first night as a real cuckold was a total blast, and Adam cannot wait to experience that kind of intense pleasure again. The videos she sent him in her many sexcapades, although kinky, they were nothing compared to seeing his wife on all fours for another man.
And if that wasn’t enough, Nikki’s cocky boss, with his shameless dominating side, has taken Adam’s fantasy a step further and introduced him to a whole new level of indecency when he ordered the proud husband to get on his knees and get him ready for his wife.
The bastard proved to be the perfect fit for the couple.
So Adam and Nikki decided to continue exploring this wild fantasy by inviting the cocky boss into their own home for another intense night.

Will this night be better than the first one?
Will Adam find pleasure in tainting his marital bed with another man?
Follow their wild Sex Story and find out!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Contains lesbian and straight sex scenes.
